SELECT o.*, p.title AS productName, m1.id AS buyerId, m2.id AS sellerId FROM `order` o JOIN product p ON o.productNo = p.no
JOIN member m1 ON o.memberNo = m1.no
JOIN member m2 ON p.memberNo = m2.no WHERE o.orderType = '대여' AND o.endDate < NOW()
AND o.orderNo LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND p.no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND p.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
select count(*) from `order` where memberNo=#{memberNo} and productNo=#{productNo}
